content: Senor Pink gave Franky a stiff challenge with his Sui Sui no Mi powers, although displayed many odd quirks. Machvise then attacked Franky by increasing his weight and slamming into the ground, and Bastille's forces arrived to confront Franky as well. Despite being overwhelmed, Franky was committed to his task of taking down all his attackers, but despite his best efforts, he was defeated.
